acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable Pojos with non generic collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosWithNonGenericCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object <span class='step-parameter'>ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo ( nonGenerifiedCollection = [java.lang.Object@16204061 should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@480f24b1 elements
Then the Set<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[java.lang.Object@b300af4 should contain at least one non-empty element
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@454cd9e4 elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{java.lang.Object@405a2c7b=java.lang.Object@4df812b6 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly java.lang.Object@758d901e=java.lang.Object@11c07f67 elements
